settings.title: Career at YUUM
settings.subtitle: Work where culture, flavour and purpose meet. At YUUM, we believe that dessert is more than a treat — it’s a moment of connection, creativity, and culture.

settings.text: Beautifully designed spaces to work and create

settings.heading: As we grow, we're seeking curious, thoughtful, and driven individuals — from baristas to creatives, and operations to hospitality. People who care about their work and value authenticity.
settings.description:
Our mission is to bring exceptional Japanese-inspired flavours to people through a modern, minimal experience that feels both warm and bold.

We’re not just building a café. We’re creating a new flavour culture — one that’s inclusive, expressive, and elevated. At YUUM, your ideas matter. Your attention to detail matters. And your passion for doing things right (and beautifully) is what moves us forward.
Whether you’re serving handcrafted matcha, shaping product strategy, or sharing a mochi smile with a first-time guest — you’re part of something meaningful.
settings.additional_text: We're not just building a café. We're creating a new flavor culture — one that's inclusive, expressive, and deliberate. At YUUM, your ideas matter. Your attention to detail matters. And your passion for doing things right (and beautifully) is what moves us forward.
settings.cta_text: If this sounds like you and you're ready to create something truly special, check out our open roles. You care about flavour and function. You care — about people, about craft, and about building something with intention.

settings.heading: Join us
settings.text_line_1: Open roles coming soon. To express your interest, email us at careers@yuum.co.uk
